title: PM felicitates President Shavkat Mirziyoyev on re-election
content:
In a tweet he said, “I extend heartiest congratulations to Shavkat Mirziyoyev on his re-election as President of Uzbekistan. His electoral victory is reflective of the trust that the people of Uzbekistan repose in his leadership. I look forward to working with him to further build on Pakistan-Uzbekistan bilateral relations for the benefit of our two friendly countries.”
